markdownRemark.excerpt: CHAN-DST slot imbalance 문제를 해결하고자 adaptive objective를 도입 a contextual hierarchical attention network (CHAN)를 사용: dislogue history에서 relevant context…
markdownRemark.html:
CHAN-DST

  • slot imbalance 문제를 해결하고자 adaptive objective를 도입
  • a contextual hierarchical attention network (CHAN)를 사용: dislogue history에서 relevant context를 찾기 위함 → 각 턴의 발화로부터 word-level 관련 정보 검색 → contextual representation으로 encode → 모든 context표현을 turn-level관련 정보로 집계한 후 word-level 정보와 합친 output 생성
  • state transition prediction task

Definition

  • TTT: turn
  • UtU_tUt​: user utterance of turn t
  • RtR_tRt​: system response of turn t
  • XXX: {(U1,R1),...,(UT,RT)}\left\{(U_1, R_1), ... , (U_T, R_T)\right\}{(U1​,R1​),...,(UT​,RT​)}
  • BtB_tBt​: {(s,vt),s∈S}\left\{(s, v_t), s \in S\right\}{(s,vt​),s∈S}
  • SSS: set of slots
  • vtv_tvt​: corresponding value of the slot sss
  • slot: concatenation of a domain name and a slot name

Contextual Hierarchical Attention Network

1. Sentence Encoder

utterance encoder

  • BERT special token사용 → [CLS] : 문장의 representation들을 합치기위해 사용 (to aggregate the whole representation of a sentence) → [SEP] : 문장의 끝을 나타내기위해 사용.
  • Ut={w1u,...,wlu}U_t = \left\{w_1^u, ..., w_l^u\right\}Ut​={w1u​,...,wlu​} (user utterance) Rt={w1r,...,wl′r}R_t = \left\{w_1^r, ..., w_{l'}^r\right\}Rt​={w1r​,...,wl′r​} (system response) ttt: dialogue turn
  • ht=BERTfinetune([Rt;Ut])h_t = BERT_{finetune}([R_t;U_t])ht​=BERTfinetune​([Rt​;Ut​]) (hth_tht​: contextual word representations)
  • 여기서 BERT finetune은 training도중 finetuning이 될것을 의미.

slot-value encoder

  • BERTfixedBERT_{fixed}BERTfixed​는 contextual semantics vectors로 encode해준다.
  • utterance encode할때와 다른 점은 [CLS] 토큰의 output vector를 전체 문장 representation할때 사용한다. (to obtain the whole sentence representation)
  • hs=BERTfixed(s)h_s = BERT_{fixed}(s)hs​=BERTfixed​(s) htv=BERTfixed(vt)h_t^v = BERT_{fixed}(v_t)htv​=BERTfixed​(vt​)
  • BERTfixedBERT_{fixed}BERTfixed​는 training 도중 고정되어있다. 그래서 우리 모델은 unseen slots and values에 대해서 original BERT representation로 확장해서 보는게 가능하다.

2. Slot-Word Attention

  • slot-word attention은 multi-head attention을 사용한다.
  • cs,tword=MultiHead(hs,ht,ht)c_{s,t}^{word} = MultiHead(h^s, h_t, h_t)cs,tword​=MultiHead(hs,ht​,ht​)

3. Context Encoder

  • context encoder : unidirectional transformer encoder
  • {1, ..., t} 턴에서 추출 된 word-level slot-related 정보의 contextual relevance를 모델링하기 위한 것.

  • NNN개의 idenctical한 layer가 있다.

    • 각 layer는 2개의 sub-layer를 가지고 있다.
    • 첫번째 sub-layer: masked multi-head self-attention(Q = K = V)
    • 두번째 sub-layer: position-wise fully connected feed-forward network(FFN) (two linear transformations, RELU activation으로 구성)
    • FFN(x)=max(0,xW1+b1)W2+b2FFN(x) = max(0, xW_1 + b_1)W_2 + b_2FFN(x)=max(0,xW1​+b1​)W2​+b2​
  • mn=FFN(MultiHead(mn−1,mn−1,mn−1))m^n = FFN(MultiHead(m^{n-1}, m^{n-1}, m^{n-1}))mn=FFN(MultiHead(mn−1,mn−1,mn−1)) m0=[cs,1word+PE(1),...,cs,tword+PE(t)]m^0 = [c_{s,1}^{word} + PE(1), ..., c_{s,t}^{word} + PE(t)]m0=[cs,1word​+PE(1),...,cs,tword​+PE(t)] cs,≤tctx=mNc_{s,\leq t}^{ctx} = m^Ncs,≤tctx​=mN
  • mnm^nmn: n번째 context encoder레이어의 아웃풋 PE(.)PE(.)PE(.): positional encoding function

4. Slot-Turn Attention

  • turn-level relevant information을 contextual representation에서 검출해내기 위해 사용
  • cs,tturn=MultiHead(hs,cs,≤tctx,cs,≤tctx)c_{s,t}^{turn} = MultiHead(h^s, c_{s,\leq t}^{ctx},c_{s,\leq t}^{ctx})cs,tturn​=MultiHead(hs,cs,≤tctx​,cs,≤tctx​)
  • 이로인해 word-level and turn-level 의 relevant information을 historical dialogues에서 얻어낼 수 있다.

5. Global-Local Fusion Gate

  • global context와 local utterance의 균형을 맞추기 위해, contextual information과 current turn information의 비율을 조절함.
  • cs,tword,  cs,tturnc_{s,t}^{word},~~ c_{s,t}^{turn}cs,tword​,  cs,tturn​에 따라 global과 local정보가 어떻게 결합되어야할지 알려주는 fusion gate mechanism을 사용
  • gs,t=σ(Wg⨀[cs,tword;cs,tturn])g_{s,t} = \sigma(W_g\bigodot[c_{s,t}^{word};c_{s,t}^{turn}])gs,t​=σ(Wg​⨀[cs,tword​;cs,tturn​])

  • cs,tgate=gs,t⨂cs,tword+(1−gs,t⨂cs,tturn)c_{s,t}^gate = g_{s,t}\bigotimes c_{s,t}^{word} + (1-g_{s,t}\bigotimes c_{s,t}^{turn})cs,tg​ate=gs,t​⨂cs,tword​+(1−gs,t​⨂cs,tturn​)

    • Wg∈R2d×dW_g \in R^{2d\times d}Wg​∈R2d×d
    • σ\sigmaσ: Sigmoid
    • ⨀\bigodot⨀, ⨂\bigotimes⨂
  • os,to_{s,t}os,t​ = LayerNorm(Linear(Dropout(cs,tgatec_{s,t}^{gate}cs,tgate​)))

  • value vtv_tvt​에 대한 확률분포와 training objective p(vt∣U≤t, R≤t,s)=exp(−∣∣os,t−htv∣∣2)∑v′∈Vsexp(−∣∣os,t−htv′∣∣2)p(v_t|U_{\leq t},~R_{\leq t}, s) = exp(-||o_{s,t} - h_t^v||2)\over {\sum{v'\in V_s}exp(-||o_{s,t}-h_t^{v'}||2)}∑v′∈Vs​exp(−∣∣os,t​−htv′​∣∣2)p(vt​∣U≤t​, R≤t​,s)=exp(−∣∣os,t​−htv​∣∣2)​ LdstL{dst}Ldst =∑s∈S∑t=1T−log(p(v^t∣U≤t, R≤t,s))= \sum_{s\in S}\sum ^T_{t = 1}-log(p(\hat v_t|U_{\leq t},~R_{\leq t}, s))=∑s∈S​∑t=1T​−log(p(v^t​∣U≤t​, R≤t​,s))

    • VsV_sVs​: candidate value set of slot s
    • v^t∈Vs\hat v_t \in V_sv^t​∈Vs​: ground-truth value of slot s

State Transition Prediction

  • relevant context를 더 잘 포착하기 위해, auxiliary binary classification task사용.
  • cs,tstp=tanh(Wc⊙cs,tgate)c_{s,t}^{stp} = tanh(W_c \odot c_{s,t}^{gate})cs,tstp​=tanh(Wc​⊙cs,tgate​)

  • ps,tstp=σ(Wp⊙[cs,tstp;cs,t−1stp])p_{s,t}^{stp} = \sigma (W_p \odot [c_{s,t}^{stp};c_{s, t-1}^{stp}])ps,tstp​=σ(Wp​⊙[cs,tstp​;cs,t−1stp​])

    • Wc∈Rd×dW_c \in \R^{d\times d}Wc​∈Rd×d
    • Wc∈R2dW_c \in \R^{2d}Wc​∈R2d
    • t=1t = 1t=1일때는 cs,tstpc_{s,t}^{stp}cs,tstp​와 zero vectors를 concat함.
  • binary CE loss (ys,tstpy_{s,t}^{stp}ys,tstp​: ground-truth transition labels // ps,tstpp_{s,t}^{stp}ps,tstp​: transition probability)
  • Lstp=∑s∈S∑t=1T−ys,tstp . log(ps,tstp)L_{stp} = \sum_{s\in S}\sum_{t = 1}^T -y_{s,t}^{stp}~.~log(p_{s,t}^{stp})Lstp​=∑s∈S​∑t=1T​−ys,tstp​ . log(ps,tstp​)

Adaptive Objective

  • hard slots와 samples에 관한 optimization을 encourage한다.
  • all slots의 learning을 balancing함.
  • accsvalacc_s^{val}accsval​: accuracy of slot s on validation set

  • slot-level difficulty if accsval≤accs′valacc_s^{val} \leq acc_{s'}^{val}accsval​≤accs′val​; → slot s 가 slot s'보다 더 어려운 것. → α\alphaα: slot-level difficulty

    • αs=1−accsval∑s′∈S1−accs′val⋅∣S∣\alpha_s = {1 - acc_s^{val} \over {\sum_{s'\in S} 1-acc_{s'}^{val}}} \cdot |S|αs​=∑s′∈S​1−accs′val​1−accsval​​⋅∣S∣

  • sample-level difficulty → Suppose there are two samples {(Ut,Rt),(s,vt)}\left\{(U_t, R_t),(s, v_t)\right\}{(Ut​,Rt​),(s,vt​)} and {(Ut′,Rt′),(s′,vt′)}\left\{(U_{t'}, R_{t'}),(s', v_{t'})\right\}{(Ut′​,Rt′​),(s′,vt′​)} → 만약 former confidence 가 latter보다 더 낮다면, 첫번째 sample이 두번째보다 더 어려운 것. → β\betaβ: sample level difficulty

    • β(s,vt)=(1−p(s,vt))γ\beta(s, v_t) = (1 - p(s, v_t))^\gammaβ(s,vt​)=(1−p(s,vt​))γ
    • p(s,vt)p(s,v_t)p(s,vt​): confidence of sample (Ut,Rt),(s,vt)(U_t, R_t),(s, v_t)(Ut​,Rt​),(s,vt​) γ\gammaγ: hyper-parameter
  • Ladapt(s,vt)=−αsβ(s,vt)log(p(s,vt))L_{adapt}(s,v_t) = -\alpha_s\beta(s, v_t)log(p(s, v_t))Ladapt​(s,vt​)=−αs​β(s,vt​)log(p(s,vt​))
  • slot s가 평균 slot의 difficulty보다 높다면, αs\alpha_sαs​는 s에 대한 loss를 키울 것이다. 비슷하게, sample의 optimization이 low confidence를 갖고 있다면 loss는 커질것이다.

Optimization

  • During joint training, we optimize the sum of these two loss functions as following Ljoint=Ldst+LstpL_{joint} = L_{dst} + L_{stp}Ljoint​=Ldst​+Lstp​
  • At the fine-tuning phase, we adopt the adaptive objective to fine-tune DST task as following Lfinetune=∑s∈S∑t=1TLadapt(s,v^t)L_{finetune} = \sum_{s\in S}\sum^T_{t=1}L_{adapt(s, \hat v_t)}Lfinetune​=∑s∈S​∑t=1T​Ladapt(s,v^t​)​

참고 자료

  • 논문: A Contextual Hierarchical Attention Network with Adaptive Objective for Dialogue State Tracking
  • GitHub: CHAN-DST
